entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 02:17 AM AST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain changing to rain before morning. Snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm inland and over higher terrain. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to a few flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 7. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
